data.title: Scrumptious burger
data.text: Whether you go for the meat burger or the portobello mushroom burger, food here is fresh and delicious. G burger is good for 2 people.  That is how big it is

data.title: Great flavor!
data.text: This is my favorite burger.  It's loaded with flavor!  I love the teriyaki glazed onions.  The Parmesan  garlic fries are yummy.

data.title: Now this is how burgers should be!!
data.text: If you love a good burger, I mean a really good burger, then try G Burger. From their customer service, to their awesome menu, this place has something for the burger connoisseur to the picky eater. They will make your burger any way you want it. They have great fries and onion rings too! Oh, and try the beer battered zucchini! You can have anything put on your burger such as  fresh grilled pineapple,  teriyaki glazed onions, portobello mushrooms, fried jumbo egg, pastrami,  and applewood smoked bacon....just to name a few. They have great sandwiches and salads too if burgers aren't your thing! Check it out for yourself! You'll be glad you did!

data.title: Burger Heaven
data.text: If you want a truly great Hamburger outside of  In-an-Out you must try the G-Burger. It is absolutely the best non fast food meal you will ever eat in La Habra. All Burgers are cooked to your exact liking and the staff go out of their way to make sure you are totally happy with your meal.

data.title: Meh
data.text: I came here on the recommendation of my son, who is somewhat of a hipster.  He swears by this place and comes here regularly.  I personally didn't see the big deal and though it was overpriced.  Don't get me wrong; it's not bad food.  It's good.  It's not great and it's definitely overpriced.

data.title: fancyburgers
data.text: The burger was tasty but I didn't care too much for the fries.  Maybe I let them sit too long before eating which was my mistake.

data.title: Caprese burger! Yum!
data.text: I am kind of stuck on the Caprese Burger, but I know all the burgers have to be as good! The onion rings are the best I have had and the fries aren't too shabby either. So glad this top notch gourmet burger joint is in my hometown!

data.title: G is for Great Burgers
data.text: Decided to try this place based on the reviews on trip advisor. Ordered a cheeseburger and fries combo. Everything here is cooked fresh and the burger was really good and juicy...so it does take some time. This is more of a sit down place than a take out. Burger was HUGE and came with more fries than I could eat. If you want a really great burger, you need to try Gburger.

data.title: "BURGER HEAVEN"
data.text: If a great burger is what you're looking for, here's "Gburger". If a fresh thick patty, fresh lettuce, tomatoes,onions, buns, are what you desire, look no further than the "Gburgers". Prices are a little higher than most typical burger houses, but well worth the money. I took my wife there several months ago, and she will not eat burgers at any other burger joints.

data.title: I don't get the g but I don't care
data.text: This is one of those places that reminds you that a burger can indeed be considered food.  It's a little pricey so not like stopping at McDonalds but well worth it on occasion.

data.title: Just because you wear a Chef coat doesn't mean you are a Chef...
data.text: Don't get me wrong.  This is a great place to get awesome fries with G Sauce or Spicy Catchup or a chicken sandwich.  Awesone!  If you want a burger, make sure you ask for it at least Medium-well because these guys think they know how you like your food better than you and it is RAW.  My first experience ever the beef was not cooked.  I should have known something was up when the cook was using a upside down pie tin to help cook the meat. Never again will I eat their beef.  That was a pricey meal for my dog.

data.title: I give the burgers and fries a 10, what a find!
data.text: The physical restaurant could use a little sprucing up.  But really are you going for the external. ambiance or because you want an extraordinary burger with fresh ingredients, high quality meat, fresh buns and crisp fries both regular or sweet potato?

data.title: Good burgers
data.text: Loved the building. Loved the burgers even more. The flavor of the meat is what I really enjoyed. There are many different burgers to choose from. Parking here sucks but easily found on the nearby street.

data.title: Best burger anywhere
data.text: What a pleasant lunch! I'm not a burger lover but this one was to die for. Quick service, perfectly cooked with fresh ingredients. Wish I still lived in the area because any time I'm there I try to make it my lunch stop

data.title: OMG
data.text: This place has a casual atmosphere and has great burgers and sandwiches.  I met a group of people from work here and everyone was really pleased with their meal.  Also try the sweet potato fries.

data.title: Great burgers...customize-able.
data.text: We were given a gift certificate for this restaurant, we ordered our burgers and took them home.  They were great.  I really do think some higher priced burgers are worth it and this one is definitely a good one.

data.title: one of the best hand made burgers
data.text: small with seating and parking for just a few, a little pricey, with meals regularly going for about $12, huge side orders made for sharing..atmosphere of a burger stand..but with gourmet burgers.

data.title: good burgers
data.text: I like G-Burgers, hamburgers with all the add on's  you could want. The burgers are delicious and the help friendly. The only complaint my wife has is she likes her meat well well  done no pink, twice they have failed in this respect. But the rest of the family likes the burgers and so does my wife when the cooks get it right, which they now understand what well well no pink means

data.title: Hamburger - The best!
data.text:
I have passed this unassuming "take out"
for a year or so and never stopped. The
Other day my husband and I decided to
give it a try. I'm so glad we did. We ordered
cheeseburgers (your choice of cheese) &
fries. Delicious burger and a bun that doesn't crumble and fall apart. The fries
were warm and crispy.
I said "take out" at the beginning of this review. There are a few tables inside &
picnic tables outside. Also, many choices
of burgers and fillings. You won't go wrong 
if you're a burger lover.

data.title: Gourmet Burgers
data.text:
FOOD: We have read so much about G Burger that we had to go and try it out.  Our feelings, WE WERE LET DOWN - THEY WERE AVERAGE AT BEST.  We tried two different burgers there that the girl recommended to us, the Caprese Burger and the White Truffle Burger and we only at a part of each burger and left the place.  The regular fries were very good.
PRICE: For hamburgers they were expensive and not worth it to us.
SERVICE: You order at the counter and they bring the food to you table.
PARKING: Free parking in their parking lot.
WE WILL NEVER RETURN
